title: Artifacts MMO Bot Sell Rules
description: Controls which items get sold on the Grand Exchange and how they're priced.

sellDuplicateEquipment.description: Sell surplus equipment from bank (keeps 'keepPerEquipmentCode' copies of each)

keepPerEquipmentCode.description: Number of copies to keep per equipment item code before selling extras

alwaysSell.description: Items to always sell when found in bank

keepInBank.description: Quantity to keep in bank before selling the rest

neverSell.description: Item codes that should never be sold, even if they match other rules

pricingStrategy.description: Pricing strategy. Currently only 'undercut' is implemented â€” queries GE listings and undercuts the lowest price.

undercutPercent.description: Percentage to undercut the lowest GE listing by (e.g. 1 = 1% below lowest)

minPrice.description: Minimum sell price floor (never list below this)

cancelStaleAfterHours.description: Cancel unsold GE orders older than this many hours. 0 = never cancel.
